description:
Minnesota's Top Personal Injury Practice

Serving clients throughout Ramsey County and the surrounding areas from our law office in White Bear Lake, Minnesota, the attorneys at Sand Law are fully committed to helping you obtain the maximum amount of compensation for your injuries and losses.

Focusing exclusively on personal injury and wrongful death claims, attorneys Rick Sand and William Anthony Sand, our law firm's founding partners, fight hard on behalf of innocent accident victims and their families struggling to make ends meet in the wake of a preventable tragedy.

Combining Our Resources For The Highest Level Of Support

Working together, we combine our years of experience and relative strengths as award-winning trial attorneys to deliver the personalized assistance and compassionate support you need as you deal with your claims involving motor vehicle accidents, slip-and-fall accidents, child injuries, recreational injuries and more.

Results-Driven, Powerhouse Attorneys Fighting For You

Having earned a reputation as tenacious litigators, we will fight aggressively to protect your rights and best interests while striving to help you secure the finances you deserve to support yourself and your family.
Over the course of our history, we have recovered millions of dollars on behalf of those in need, earning our reputations as two of the top personal injury advocates in the region.

If you are suffering as the result of someone else's negligence or wrongdoing, you do not need to face your battle alone. By contacting our law office and taking advantage of our free initial consultation, you can discover why so many in our community trust Sand Law for their most important and serious legal challenges.
